name: Caller ID - Phone Dialer, Call Blocker, Recorder
description: Caller ID is app use our true caller ID to identify calls and see photos and names of unknown caller and contacts in your phone book. Call recorder - ACR lets you easily record your incoming and outgoing phone calls and VoIP conversations.   Caller ID is the best app for identifying and blocking unwanted and spam calls    MAIN FEATURES - Caller id, Spam detection & Caller Block, Phone Dialer - Block calls - simply block unwanted calls - Merge all duplicate contacts - T9 Dialer - quickly search by name & numbers - Phone Number Search - Over 50 beautiful themes available - Backup your contacts - Powerful numbers database to find call detail of unknown phone number. - Smart phone number Search help to know who is calling. - Best call blocker can auto block spam calls and add in call blacklist. - Scan and identify your call history. Get contact and display details about strange calls. - Automatically record every call. Record each conversation the moment it starts; - Automatically record selected contacts. Create a list of people you want to always record; ** Caller ID, Call Blocker - Identify unknown caller ID, block unwanted calls - Identify spammers- identify unknown phone numbers and report spam calls - Find Out Who Called You if you missed an unknown call - Block numbers and texts you want to avoid like telemarketers, scammers, bill collectors, robocalls, etc - Block calls to control who can call you, just add a number to the call blacklist and true call blocker will do the rest. - Real-Time Caller ID to always know whos calling before you receive. - Call Blocker Block Unwanted Spam Caller with this call recorder app.  ** SMART DIALER - T9 Dialer - quickly search by name & numbers - Caller ID has an easy-to-use T9 dialer that helps make phone calls in the app directly. - Manage your calls & contacts list in the Call history using our free caller ID app easily. - Set caller id app as your default Phone Dialer.   ** Call Blocker - Block numbers and texts you want to avoid like telemarketers, scammers, bill collectors, robocalls, etc Block calls to control who can call you, just add a number to the call blacklist and true call blocker will do the rest.  ** Phone Number Search - Search for any phone number with our smart search system. Use the phone number lookup app to see who called me. Easily to see the true caller ID!  ** Smart Call Log Shows in detail with the true caller name in recent call history. Including the missed calls, completed incoming and outgoing calls. No unknown phone numbers anymore.   Call Recorder Automatically record calls to mp3 audio file format. The ACR Call Recording App is an easy to use automatic call recorder app that records all daily calls in high quality. It records all your incoming & outgoing calls in high quality and stores it on your phone as .amr files. This call recorder app can be used without limits to record calls and is totally free to use
